name: Black and White Long Necklace : Lava and Mother of Pearl : Monochrome Jewelry
description:
Jet black cubes of natural lava and tiny white mother of pearl cubes are suspended from a long, sturdy silver plated chain. Simple and elegant. 

The lava beads are lightly coated with a clear wax finish so they won't snag or damage your clothes. This necklace is 29 inches in length. I am happy to make it at a custom length for no extra charge. The necklace slips over your head (no clasp). Crafted with sterling silver wire.

:: :: :: :: :: :: :: :: :: ::

Natural Gorgeous jewelry is handmade necklaces, earrings and bracelets featuring colorful gemstones, pearls, shell, vintage beads and fiber. Natural Gorgeous is worn by unique women who appreciate genuine materials and individual style. Every piece is handcrafted, authentic and naturally gorgeous.

I have more items than are listed here at my other shop, and new items are listed there first. Please stop by:  naturalgorgeous.etsy.com
